name: Wind Up (deadlyfishes, ThatAsianGameDev)
description:
Here comes a unique spin on a platformer that has (probably) never been done before!

You play as a wind up toy that was dropped in a well, doing its absolute best to get out and return to its owner. 

However! There is a twist. To fit the jam theme that was "rewind", we made it so the amount that the toy has been wound up is equal to the room's speed. For example, if you are fully unwound, time will be at a standstill. Time your jumps correctly! Since you dropped in a well, you must escape the water that will always be hot on your tail. (Do wind up toys have tails?) Anyway. Good luck, and don't drown! heh

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys to move

Space/W/Up to jump

Hold E to rewind

ESC to pause

F4 to go fullscreen
